abstract: Mr. Alfond parlayed a hitchhiker’s tip into a fortune by founding the Dexter Shoe Company and running it for four decades.
snippet: Mr. Alfond parlayed a hitchhiker’s tip into a fortune by founding the Dexter Shoe Company and running it for four decades.
lead_paragraph: Harold Alfond, a former factory laborer who parlayed a hitchhiker’s tip into a fortune by founding the Dexter Shoe Company and running it for four decades, died Friday at a family home in Belgrade Lakes, Me. He was 93 and lived in Palm Beach, Fla.

headline.main: Harold Alfond, Donor and Shoe Factory Owner, Dies at 93
headline.print_headline: Harold Alfond, 93, Dies; Founder of Dexter Shoes
